name: RTCPeerConnection.identityresult_event
description: An identityresult event is sent to an RTCPeerConnection object's onidentityresult event handler to inform it that an assertion has been generated by an associated identity provider (IdP) during the process of creating an SDP offer or answer.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'identityresult' in WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers.
